summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the offer of Jayne M. Perkins individually, and as Executrix of the Will of Clinton R. Perkins, deceased, to sell Lot 10 and a portion of Lot 11, Block 106, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition to The City of Seattle (Volume 6 of Plats, page 40, Records of King County, Washington) on which are situated the Normandy Apartments, to the City for Three Hundred Thousand Dollars ($300,000), making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
